intro: Physospermopsis bhutanensis, commonly known as the Bhutanese physosperm, is a rare flowering plant native to the mountainous regions of Bhutan. It belongs to the family Ericaceae and is characterized by its small, evergreen leaves and delicate, bell-shaped flowers.
